metadata.title: CVE-2022-38266 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the Leptonica linked library (v1.79.0) allows attackers tocause an arithmetic exception leading to a Denial of Service (DoS) via acrafted JPEG file.

criterions.comment: tesseract: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
